text: I ordered 2 large pizzas in January.  I was informed that it should take 30 minutes for delivery.  The wait was over 1.5 hours (more than 3 times what was quoted). I called a couple of days later and was informed they were short-staffed and …More

text: The customer service at this place is usually top notch... The complete opposite of the other pizza places around here.  You can tell that the employees like their jobs and the company they work for.

name: What’s The Tea
text: I had a buy one get one coupon. I forgot to use the coupon when placing the order online so I called the store and they said to just bring the coupon into the store. When I got to the store, the cashier said the total was $31.82 without the …More

text: Worst f...ing pizza service. Left me on hold for over 10 minutes. Pizza was just bread with some cheese and almost no sauce. Would not recommend this place. Youre better off ordering from chuck e cheese.

text: Absolutely LOVE Papa John's Pizza! Fast & Early Delivery, Hot & Fresh Pizza, Extra Friendly Staff, Free Garlic Sauce with Every Pizza Ordered, Reward Points with Every Purchase that goes towards a Free Pizza, Free Pizza Give Aways often, …More

text: Extremely helpful service with pizza made to request. No matter how off the wall. Ethan the manager jumps in to help anytime the other employees need a hand.

text: We've ordered pizza online for carryout several times over the past couple months. Papa John's in general has some of my favorite pizza, and they definitely have the best coupons. I always order online for convenience, you can enter coupon …More

text: It was good I ordered  a chicken with regular crust and tomato sauce. It was all right the one thing I will suggest to the owner is don't let your crust be so flourey at the end of it.

text: We always order from this location. For the past 2 years we have used the app and have gotten our food no later than 40 minutes as promised. Well here we are over an hour so I call the store, the supervisor on duty tried calling the driver …More
